title: Cutting cake & giving gifts during an occasion like wedding, graduation...permissible? Assimalhakeem
transcript: he said what's the ruling on cutting a cake so i'm getting married mel forbid and on the wedding night the mrs and i are celebrating we have a cake and we cut the cake maybe holding each other's hands to ensure that none of us is going to stab the other from the very beginning beginning of the night and we cut the cake and we give it to guests and relatives who are attending there's no problem in that this is totally permissible whether you cut the cake or you uh give away candies or maybe a soup of lentil soup whatever this is all cultural and and permissible and so the the case with graduations
